languages.text: {n}Внезапно на лице его возникает улыбка.{/n} "Так было и раньше. Дух превыше тела, он проступает в материи и преображает ее, делая подобной себе".
{n}Suddenly a smile appears on his face.{/n} "This has happened before. The spirit transcends the body. The matter in which it manifests itself is transformed into something more spirit-like."
languages.original_text: {n}Внезапно на лице его возникает улыбка.{/n} "Так было и раньше. Дух превыше тела, он проступает в материи и преображает ее, делая подобной себе".

traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}突然、アベルの顔に笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「前にもこんなことがありました。魂が肉体を超越するのだ。こんなことが現れる物質というのは、もっと魂に近い何かに変換されるのかもしれない」
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly a smile appears on his face.{/n} "This has happened before. The spirit transcends the body. The matter in which it manifests itself is transformed into something more spirit-like."

traits.locale_text: {n}突然、アベルの顔に笑みが浮かぶ。{/n}「前にもこんなことがありました。魂が肉体を超越するのだ。こんなことが現れる物質というのは、もっと魂に近い何かに変換されるのかもしれない」
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}突然之间，他的脸上露出了微笑。{/n}“以前曾发生过这种情况。精神超越了肉体，肉体的表现形式被转化为了某种更加类似于精神的东西。”
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly a smile appears on his face.{/n} "This has happened before. The spirit transcends the body. The matter in which it manifests itself is transformed into something more spirit-like."

traits.locale_text: {n}突然之间，他的脸上露出了微笑。{/n}“以前曾发生过这种情况。精神超越了肉体，肉体的表现形式被转化为了某种更加类似于精神的东西。”
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Soudainement, il se met à sourire.{/n} « Ce n'est pas la première fois que cela se produit. L'esprit transcende le corps. La matière qui le compose est transformée en quelque chose de plus spirituel. »
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly a smile appears on his face.{/n} "This has happened before. The spirit transcends the body. The matter in which it manifests itself is transformed into something more spirit-like."

traits.locale_text: {n}Soudainement, il se met à sourire.{/n} « Ce n'est pas la première fois que cela se produit. L'esprit transcende le corps. La matière qui le compose est transformée en quelque chose de plus spirituel. »
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}De repente esboza una sonrisa.{/n} «Esto ya ha ocurrido otras veces. El espíritu emerge del cuerpo y la materia en la que se manifiesta se transforma en algo más espiritual».
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly a smile appears on his face.{/n} "This has happened before. The spirit transcends the body. The matter in which it manifests itself is transformed into something more spirit-like."

traits.locale_text: {n}De repente esboza una sonrisa.{/n} «Esto ya ha ocurrido otras veces. El espíritu emerge del cuerpo y la materia en la que se manifiesta se transforma en algo más espiritual».
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Plötzlich erscheint auf seinem Gesicht ein Lächeln.{/n} "Das ist schon einmal geschehen. Der Geist transzendiert den Körper. Die Materie, in der er sich manifestiert, wird in etwas fast Geistähnliches verwandelt."
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly a smile appears on his face.{/n} "This has happened before. The spirit transcends the body. The matter in which it manifests itself is transformed into something more spirit-like."

traits.locale_text: {n}Plötzlich erscheint auf seinem Gesicht ein Lächeln.{/n} "Das ist schon einmal geschehen. Der Geist transzendiert den Körper. Die Materie, in der er sich manifestiert, wird in etwas fast Geistähnliches verwandelt."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved

languages.text: {n}Yüzünde aniden bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Bu daha önce de olmuştu. Ruh, bedenin ötesine geçer. Kendini içinde var ettiği madde, daha ruhani bir şeye dönüşür."
languages.original_text: {n}Suddenly a smile appears on his face.{/n} "This has happened before. The spirit transcends the body. The matter in which it manifests itself is transformed into something more spirit-like."

traits.locale_text: {n}Yüzünde aniden bir gülümseme beliriyor.{/n} "Bu daha önce gerçekleşmişti. Ruh, bedenin ötesine geçer. Kendini içinde var ettiği madde, daha ruhani bir şeye dönüşür."
traits.speaker: AvelSaved
